CustomField.description: The field used to determine the ownership on an Account record. ** Do not use this field anymore, it is not always up to date when code needs it. Use the Owner_Zip_Code field instead. 8/11/2015
CustomField.formula: IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode )), LEN(ShippingPostalCode) >= 5) , LEFT(ShippingPostalCode,5) , IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode)), LEN(BillingPostalCode) >= 5) , LEFT(BillingPostalCode,5) , NULL))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field used to determine the ownership on an Account record.
CustomField.label: Owner Zip Code*
